steps.title: ðŸ’³ Polar Integration
steps.description: Set up subscription and billing with Polar
instructions: 2. Click 'Sell with Polar' to set up your organization
4. Gather your credentials from the dashboard

variables.name: POLAR_ACCESS_TOKEN
variables.details:
Generate this token in Settings > General > Developers
Required permissions:
- checkouts (read/write)
- products (read/write)
- subscriptions (read/write)
- customers (read/write)
- checkout_links (read/write)
- customer_portal (read/write)
- customer_sessions (write)

variables.name: POLAR_WEBHOOK_SECRET
variables.details:
Create in Settings > Webhooks
Payload format: Raw
Required events:
- product.created/updated
- subscription.created/updated

additionalInstructions: Note: The sandbox environment is recommended for initial testing
